mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Dr. Sidney Isenberg Collection on Carson McCullers Papers, 1948-1971
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Carr, Virginia Spencer
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Carr reports on progress with research on her biography of McCullers and requests a meeting with Isenberg.
There are several files available. There is one JPG image for each page of the original document. The PDF was created from scans of the original document and includes all pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: McCullers, Carson, 1917-1967
Biographers
Interviews
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from Virginia Spencer Carr to Dr. Sidney Isenberg, December 24, 1970 (correspondence)
